column4: The volumn control on the panel is showing a red x when I click it, it says either I don't have right GStreamer plugins installed or I don't have sound card configured. Anyone knows how to remedy this?
ubotu: ok, let me take a look of that.. thanks!
in kde you just right click it, can't you do the same in gnome?
I can change, but the there is only a close button, after close, the name didn't get changed
I don't know. it sounds a bit broken then
I was trying to see if anyone knows if the gnome-cups-manager reads any conf file so I can just edit the conf file and change the names instead of going to GUI
Well I believe you can edit the cups conf files by hand
edited printers.conf but when I open gnome-cups-manager, it still using those old names
does it update if you restart cupsys?
I don't think I can help then. maybe someone else ...
haha.. you know what, I changed from the KDE printer manager.
I think the gnome one is just broken
